sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.STTRMConditionTypeSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>ServicenNow code for the STTRMConditionType class</description>
        <name>STTRMConditionTypeSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var STTRMConditionTypeSNC = Class.create();
STTRMConditionTypeSNC.prototype = {
    initialize: function(conditionTypeGr, _gs) {
		this._gr = conditionTypeGr;
		this._gs = _gs;
    },

	evaluate: function(currentGr) {
		var conditionType = this._gr.getValue("condition_type");
		if (conditionType === "condition")
			return GlideFilter.checkRecord(currentGr, this._gr.getValue("condition"), true);
		
		if (conditionType === "script")
			return new GlideScopedEvaluator().evaluateScript(this._gr, "condition_script", {"current": currentGr});
		
		return false;
	},
	
    type: 'STTRMConditionTypeSNC'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-08-31 17:31:47</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>058c66d45303101034d1ddeeff7b1295</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>STTRMConditionTypeSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="State Transition Models" source="com.snc.itsm.state_transition_model">e2a381876da620100acb70b35343301b</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_058c66d45303101034d1ddeeff7b1295</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-09-09 11:40:33</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>603</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
